citation.title: Building a treebank for French.
citation.booktitle: In A. ABEILLÉ, Ed., Treebanks: Building and Using Parsed Corpora, chapter 10,

citation.booktitle: In Proceedings of the 20th International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING-2004),
citation.rawString: BOS J., CLARK S., STEEDMAN M., CURRAN J. R. & HOCKENMAIER J. (2004). Wide-coverage semantic representation from a CCG parser. In Proceedings of the 20th International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING-2004), p. 1240–1246, Geneva, Switzerland.

citation.title: Categorial grammars determined from linguistic data by unification.
citation.rawString: BUSZKOWSKI W. & PENN G. (1990). Categorial grammars determined from linguistic data by unification. Studia Logica, 49, 431–454.

citation.booktitle: In Proceedings of the 6th International Workshop on Parsing Technologies,
citation.rawString: CHEN J. & VIJAY-SJANKER K. (2000). Automated extraction of TAGs from the Penn treebank. In Proceedings of the 6th International Workshop on Parsing Technologies, Trento, Italy.

citation.rawString: CLARK S. (2002). Supertagging for combinatory categorial grammar. In Proceedings of the 6th International Workshop on Tree Adjoining Grammars and Related Formalisms, p. 19–24, Venice.

citation.title: Parsing the WSJ using CCG and log-linear models.
citation.booktitle: In Proceedings of the 42nd annual meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL-2004),
citation.rawString: CLARK S. & CURRAN J. R. (2004). Parsing the WSJ using CCG and log-linear models. In Proceedings of the 42nd annual meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL-2004), p. 104–111, Barcelona, Spain.

citation.title: CCGbank, a corpus of CCG derivations and dependency structures extracted from the Penn Treebank.
citation.rawString: HOCKENMAIER J. & STEEDMAN M. (2007). CCGbank, a corpus of CCG derivations and dependency structures extracted from the Penn Treebank. Computational Linguistics, 33(3), 355–396.

citation.title: Categorial type logics.

citation.title: Automated extraction of type-logical supertags from the spoken dutch corpus.
